meanings.definition: A person responsible for maintaining and managing a website.
meanings.sent1: The webmaster updated the website with new content.
meanings.sent2: Our webmaster is skilled at fixing website issues quickly.
meanings.sent3: The webmaster joked that the website was so old, it needed a walker.
meanings.sent4: She was the webmaster of her own online world, shaping it as she pleased.
meanings.sent5: The diligent webmaster ensured the website ran smoothly at all times.

meanings.definition: The individual in charge of overseeing the design and functionality of a website.
meanings.sent1: Our webmaster carefully chose the color scheme for the website.
meanings.sent2: The webmaster's attention to detail improved the website's user experience.
meanings.sent3: The webmaster playfully compared website design to solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: As the webmaster of creativity, she weaved magic into every webpage.
meanings.sent5: The webmaster's vision transformed the website into a digital masterpiece.
